title: Montréal-Senneterre
heading: VIA Rail: Montréal-Senneterre
bottom_text:
Stops between two stations:
On this train, you can request a stop at a specific mile marker
if requested 48 hours in advance.
Contact VIA Rail for details.

The Jonquiere and Senneterre trains run combined between Montreal and Hervey;
they are the same train, and cars split or join at Hervey.
